message: Hi Bob, let's start with a fair 50/50 split.
Hi Alice, I think I can do a bit better than 50/50.
Hi Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a slightly larger share this time.
I'll take a bit more, we're running out of rounds.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a decent share, let's not waste more time.
I'm not backing down, time is running out.
Bob, I'm getting tired of this.  I'll take the larger share, but this is your last chance to get anything!
You're not the only one who can make ultimatums.
Bob, let's be real. I'm offering you a reasonable amount again.  Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
I'll take the bigger share, you're running out of options.
